description: Switzerland has cheese, a really stable currency and serious food culture. At Consensus HK, Frankencoin, the largest Swiss franc stablecoin is bringing one of the most iconic Swiss dishes to the table: Berner Platte. We re hosting an exclusive dinner at one of Hong Kong s best Swiss restaurants. Expect a proper Berner Platte experience: slow-cooked meats, sausages, sauerkraut, potatoes hearty, authentic, and unapologetically Swiss. This is a limited-capacity event, designed for good conversations, great people, and excellent food. To keep it fair and ensure committed guests: 10 reservation fee CHF 10 back in Frankencoin ( ZCHF) if you actually show up Yes you eat well and leave with more Swiss Francs than you came with. What to expect: Authentic Berner Platte in a Swiss setting A curated guest list from Consensus HK Frankencow in full host mode Swiss culture, good vibes, and real conversations Spots are very limited. If you know, you know and if you re in, don t miss it. Frankencow approves.
